text:
[Verse]
Under the moonlight we shine
Stars above us in a line
Dreams feeling so divine
Lost in this moment so fine

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the cool night air
Heartbeats like a silent prayer
Magic with you everywhere
Lost in the groove no despair

[Chorus]
Dancing till the morning light
Together we take flight
Under the moon so bright
Everything feels just right

[Verse 3]
Footprints in the soft sand
Walking hand in hand
Time slips like fine sand
Feeling like we command

[Chorus]
Dancing till the morning light
Together we take flight
Under the moon so bright
Everything feels just right

[Bridge]
Stars fade with dawn's rise
But love stays in our eyes
No more goodbyes
Just endless skies
title: Under the Moonlight
